text: The Technicians were a short lived Australian group formed in the mid-1980s. The group released three singles, two of which peaked inside the Australian top 100. ==Discography == ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" border="1" |+ List of singles, with Australianchart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Year ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Title ! scope="col" colspan="1" | Peak chart positions |- ! scope="col" style="text-align:center;" | AUS |- | 1986 ! scope="row" | "Soldier of Fortune" | style="text-align:center;" | - |- | 1987 ! scope="row" | "Hot for Love" | style="text-align:center;" | 90 |- | 1987 ! scope="row" | "Clockwork Clown" | style="text-align:center;" | 96 |} ==References== Category:Australian pop music groups Category:Musical groups established in 1986 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 1988
title: The Technicians
